programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep695
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3396
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep47374738
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep219220
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1860
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker (M) Ep14
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience.

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: Chak, a small cleaning company owner, hits tough times during the pandemic. In need of an assistant, he hires a young single mother Candy, who unexpectedly helps him solve many difficulties at work. While life seems to get back on track, a series of cruel realities happen again, but they still bond together to support each other on the narrow road.

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his familys expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his familys reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kongs toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: The Wandering Earth II
programme.desc: In this prequel, humans build enormous engines on the Earths surface to find a new home when the sun is burning out. In the dangerous universe, a group of young people has to step forward once again to fight in the critical battle to save the Earth.

programme.title: Tales from the Occult: Body and Soul
programme.desc: This horror anthology series returns to feature three spooky crime stories about an ex-hair model, a cat lover and the love triangle between a dental nurse, a dentist and a chef. The stories depict their paths from obsession to madness, eventually tipping them over to the dark side of human nature.

programme.title: God of Gamblers 2
programme.desc: A new chapter of the highly successful "God of Gamblers". The legend's disciple Andy Lau is now rising in the gambling world as the "Knight of Gamblers"; clashing with another gambling icon, the wild psychic Stephen Chow (aka "Saint of Gamblers") who wants to follow the God. They mix like oil and water in a series of tricks and mishaps, but are forced to join hands against their master's nemesis on the gambling table.

Chow Mo Wan encounters many women in his life but is touched by none after he lost his true love. Following an encounter one day, he decides to write a fiction titled 2046 which takes place at Room 2046. Nothing ever changes at Room 2046, and people go there to find their lost memories.

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: A Simple Life
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is based on a true story. Ah Tao works as a maid for Rogers family for four generations. After they emigrated, she stays only to work for Roger, but is forced to retire and move into an elderly home after she suffered a stroke. Since then, Roger becomes her caregiver as Ah Tao starts adapting to a new life.

programme.title: A Writer's Odyssey
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name, this is the story about a father who must kill a novelist in order to find his missing daughter. Through a strange twist of fate, the fantasy world of the novel begins to impact life in the real world.

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Chois actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: Chao Yang and Zi Hong are soon to wed but both have not met the others parents. When a client requests for a livestream of their reunion dinner to promote his products, it set the stage for their parents first meeting. Estranged from his mother, Yang decides to rent a family for the dinner which results in a series of mishaps and hilarity.

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Lius family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: Social Distancing
programme.desc: Cherry is a young girl addicted to the internet. After seeing a warning video about an e-ghost on YouTube, she begins to encounter many mysterious incidents, and the e-ghost also takes control of her family. Cherry must face her unbearable past in order to get out of this horrifying paranormal world...

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Programmer and gamer Hao Ming gets approached by mercenary Fei Qiao and businessman Takeshi, and is drawn into a shady hacking game in Malaysia. The cyber mission quickly turns dangerous as Hao Ming must navigate the hidden motives and dealings of the mercenaries and figure out who's behind it all.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Gambler
programme.desc: Manfred and Flora are gambling addicts who have come across each other a few times at the casino, but do not leave impression on each other until they both suffer heavy losses and are held hostage by the loan sharks in Macau. They find themselves falling in love, and decide to get married when they come back to Hong Kong.

programme.title: Marrying Mr Perfect
programme.desc: Winnie is dumped by her boyfriend in her late twenties and unknowingly meets Koo, a ruthless tycoon in business and a playboy. Koo temporarily switches identities with his driver for security reason and falls for Winnie as she is the first girl to love him for who he is. What will happen when Winnie know Koos real identity?

programme.title: Paws-Men
programme.desc: When a dog is in need of rescue, the Paws-Men assemble to save the dog like Batman. Paws-Men tells the story of four men rescuing dogs and the many difficulties that they encounter, from a dog eatery to bullies and a dog abusing granny. Despite the hardships, Paws-Men give us a peek into the true friendships between dogs and humans.

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his familys massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: Social Distancing
programme.desc: Cherry is a young girl addicted to the internet. After seeing a warning video about an e-ghost on YouTube, she begins to encounter many mysterious incidents, and the e-ghost also takes control of her family. Cherry must face her unbearable past in order to get out of this horrifying paranormal world...

programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: A casino PR in Macau receives a classic novel 84, Charing Cross Road. She sends back the novel with a letter to where it came from as she does not like it. A real estate agent in California receives the novel and as it does not belong to him, he sends it back with a letter as well. The two form a relationship after all the back and forth.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Incredible
programme.desc: Middle-aged and retired superhero couple, Huan (Gazer Man) and Red (Aroma Woman), settles into a contented life in a remote village. They find it hard to contain their powers though, and are bored by the uneventful life. When they hear a world martial arts contest is to be held in their village, both are itching to make their long-awaited comeback!

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughters diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: Marco Polo
programme.desc: Mongolian emperor Kublai Khan is being assassinated while meeting with the Italian explorer Marco Polo. Marco Polo is appointed to lead the troops for the emperor to wipe out the anti-Mongol rebels. Yet, he is touched by these rebels who are resisting the Mongolian invasion of their homeland. Will Marco Polo stay loyal to the emperor?

programme.title: The Millionaire Chase
programme.desc: It's a fun and wild romp that mixes pleasure with pleasure. A nightclub owner, playboy Peter Chen Ho, has his ways with three sisters while gallivanting across Asia. Each one has a dangling relationship to save - ensuring a series of mishaps and comic moments.

programme.title: Danger has Two Faces
programme.desc: Many years ago, Inspector Kam killed an innocent man and decided to resign from the police force. He became a professional killer who disguises as a pet store owner. When his best friend, Bobby begins investigating recent murder cases committed by Kam, he discovers that the mastermind behind these cases is actually his superintendent.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: Killer Clans
programme.desc: This colourful, complex saga is packed with conspiracies, schemes and sword fights to produce a perfect blend of great action and gripping drama. The movie centres on the struggle for underworld supremacy between the Longmen and Roc clans, where the line between good and evil is not always that clear-cut or obvious.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Li Ching plays, Ah Chiao, a girl from a rural village stranded in the city, who befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are all poor, but Ah Chiaos fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she ultimately learns money can't buy happiness.

programme.title: The Blood Brothers
programme.desc: The friendship of three sworn brothers, Zhang, Huang and Ma breaks when Ma gives in to corruption and falls for Huang's wife, eventually leading to a bloody ending.

programme.title: The Enchanting Ghost
programme.desc: It is love beyond the grave, as a young scholar and his beautiful lover are torn apart forever by his dastardly uncle and his friend, who drive the girl to commit suicide... but with death comes revenge for the enchanting ghost. A spooky yet heart-wrenching tale...

programme.title: The Secret Of The Dirk
programme.desc: The inhabitants of the City of Liu are forced to flee when the vicious Black Tigers gang raids their city, but are able to hide all their gold and treasures in a valley. A team of swordswomen led by Liu wants to get their hands on the treasures before the bandits, but both parties will have to contend with the wandering swordsman Chou for them...

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xus until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: The Duel of the Century
programme.desc: Liu Yung and Korean "Venom" Sun Chien team up to investigate the martial-art murders of a supposedly mortally wounded swordsman, only to find deception, death, double-dealings, imposters and one deadly duel after another.

programme.title: Call to Arms
programme.desc: The aggressive and dangerous Chin Empire conquers the hard-put Chao kingdom while the Wei empire is drained of its heroes and paralyzed by an indecisive ruler. Adventure, intrigue, death and tragedy reigns before the triumphant clash of the armies.

programme.title: Lady Of Steel
programme.desc: A young swordswoman Fang Ying Qi sets out to join the Flying Dragon Clan in their defense against the invading Jin forces. Fang also intends to avenge the murder of her parents by bandit leader Han 20 years ago. Han has since taken on a false identity as a member of the Flying Dragon Clan and Fang must rely on her deadly sword skills to stop Han.

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: The Dancing Millionaires is of the most enjoyable musicals to grace the Hong Kong screens, starring husband & wife team Peter Chen Ho and Betty Loh Ti presenting some extraordinary performances.

programme.title: The Weird Man
programme.desc: During the Three Kingdoms period, a Taoist priest Yu Ji cures many patients with his supernatural powers and is loved by the people. However, the arrogant general Sun Che thinks that Yu Ji bewitches people and orders for him to be beheaded. Subsequently, the spirit of the Yu Ji rises from his dead body and takes revenge on Sun Che.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxing
programme.desc: Chan and his apprentice Fan transport vampires for a living. In their most recent job, they are hired to transport nine zombies at one go. When two of them hopped away, it is revealed that one of them is actually a man in disguise trying to escape from his enemies. It turns out that the fake zombie and Chan are both martial arts experts!

programme.title: The Eight Diagram Pole Fighter
programme.desc: The Yang Generals were ambushed by the enemies and only two of the sons survived. The fifth son of Yangs escapes to Shaolin temple and learns the pole-fighting techniques from the monks, eventually creating his own Eight Diagram Pole Fight and teaming up with the Shaolin monks to avenge his family.

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: The Proud Youth
programme.desc: Ling Hu Chong, a Huashan clans disciple, is assigned to find the successor to the score The Proud One. Ling identifies Ying for the score but finds out that she is the daughter of the evil clans leader. At the same time, he is unwittingly dragged into an epic power struggle between clans, with complicated allegiances and perplexing moralities.

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: A young musician Chi Chiang is hired by the manager of a popular band when the group's drummer/leader Charlie, quits to join a rival group. The new drummer becomes an immediate hit, causing Charlie to be very jealous. Furthermore, the young drummer's mother is dead set against him having a music career.

programme.title: Heroes Shed No Tears
programme.desc: Kao Chien Fei is a young swordsman who wields a special sword with a teardrop marked on its blade. He is charged with averting an impending crisis in the martial arts world, but the villain, Zhou Tung Lai, wishes to become the ruler in the martial arts world, and launches a scheme to pit the various heroes against one another.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: The Swordmates
programme.desc: Li asks his swordmate Wang to protect his family while he is away, but Wang rapes his wife and even has his convoy attacked. Li escaped but fears his daughter is still in danger, so he asks the nephew of his master to help protect her

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couples brothel.

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keepers daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.title: A Place to Call Home
programme.desc: Li Ching, star of Sweet is Revenge, plays one of three daughters, whose life is turned upside down when she discovers she is adopted. But things get even worse when she goes in search of her real mother. Finally, after what is almost a double tragedy, she realizes what so many knew all along: There's no place like home.

programme.title: Invincible Enforcer
programme.desc: A young man is at the wrong place at the wrong time. As he offends a police inspector, he is thrown into jail and even when released, the police goes after him until he has no choice but to become a real criminal. Only a kind and beautiful probation officer is on his side, but can she help him?

programme.title: The Story of Sue San
programme.desc: TIn this Huangmei Opera romance, Wang is the son of a respected government official whereas Sue San is a famous prostitute. Although they love each other and seem to be perfectly matched, the two are worlds apart when it comes to social ranking, which will prove hard to overcome...

programme.title: The Supreme Swordsman
programme.desc: After beating several famous swordsmen, Chin Wu-hsin (Pai Piao) of the Mo Shan clan challenges Supreme Swordsman (Wang Jung) to a duel, hoping to win his title, and is beaten and humiliated. The winner taunts him to find a Supreme Sword made by Old Eagle, a famous sword-maker (Ku Feng). When his offer to buy a sword from Old Eagle, is turned down, he challenges Old Eagle to a duel, and snatches his sword in a foul play. Old Eagle's own son Shih Yen-peh (Derek Yee) vows to avenge for his father...

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Alfred Cheung Kin-ting returns to the screen with this seriocomic look at the clash of cultures which result when a Mainland Chinese peasant brings his family to Hong Kong. Family Light Affair, whose Chinese title literally translates as "City Lights", is the director/writer's warm-hearted memoir of street life back in the early 1980s, featuring an eclectic cast of pop music and kung fu stars who shine in their poignant roles.

programme.title: Rape of the Sword
programme.desc: The film starts out with two students fighting for their deceased master's sword called the "Green Frost Sword". Han kills the other student, takes the sword and offer it to the king. The wife of the other dead student plots to take revenge, going undercover to retrieve the sword at the first opportunity in this tale of revenge and betrayal.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jins daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: Descendant of the Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: Starring the stunning, teenage heartthrob Pat Ting Hung, The Butterfly Chalice marks the important directing debut of the kung-fu film genre's most principle figure Chang Cheh, as he burst the martial arts and swordplay movie doors wide open, announcing the beginning of the end for the Cantonese musicals.

programme.desc: Tamil CBI thriller film, Starring - Mammootty, Mukesh, Jagathy Sreekumar, Saikumar & Renji Panicker

programme.desc: Tamil Action Movie, Starring, Nagarjuna, Ramya Krishna, Naga Chaitanya and Krithi Shetty.

programme.desc: Tamil Horror film, Starring - Neha Chauhan, Ravi Babu, Sri Muktha, Bharani Shankar, and Mukhtar Khan

programme.desc: Tamil family drama film, Starring - Vijay Sethupathi, Gayathrie, Guru Somasundaram, Shaji Chen, Jewel Mary

programme.desc: Tamil supernatural thriller film, Starring, Santhosh Prathap, Madhu Shalini and Sana Althaf

programme.desc: Simrita, a doctor, performs her first surgery on Viraj, a man she hates. She soon realises that she accidentally left her watch inside his body and must do whatever it takes to save her career.

programme.desc: Gosha is a trucker in northern Yakutia, who supplies his community with food, alongside low quality vodka which contributes to their alcoholism. When his truck breaks down during one of his trips, he finds himself alone in the wilderness.

programme.title: The Sunny Side Up Story
programme.desc: After years of her husband disliking her sunny side eggs, a woman finally seeks out someone to find out her special recipe. Aside from the recipe, secrets are revealed, and feelings are laid bare.

programme.title: Dogworld
programme.desc: In the near future, two friends dream of leaving the Italian city of Taranto, a wasteland ruled over by warring gangs and surrounded by barbed wire. Recruited by a local gang, and with a girl coming between them, their friendship is put to the test.

programme.title: Gold Runner
programme.desc: After getting robbed, Reza loses his job delivering gold from workshops to jewellery stores. Together with his friend, Reza devises a plan to get back on his feet by finding a legendary diamond at the bottom of an enormous septic tank.

programme.title: The Blind Detective: The Fire Devil Of Vienna
programme.desc: The charred remains of the principal of a boarding school is found. Blind ex-cop Haller goes undercover to infiltrate the community and tries to discover its dark secrets. To make things more complicated, he unexpectedly falls for his beautiful co-worker.

programme.title: International Falls
programme.desc: Dee is a middle-aged mother of two who is stuck in a Midwest rut. While on vacation, she meets Tim, a washed-up stand-up comedian, and an unlikely bond develops. Together, they find the silver lining in their gloomy lives.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Deadly Desire
programme.desc: When an Istanbul real estate manager is burned alive in his car, Inspector Mehmet zakin has to dig into a maze of corruption and fraud to try and piece together the deadly puzzle - and almost becomes a victim himself.

programme.title: Adam
programme.desc: Abla runs a modest local bakery from her home in Casablanca where she lives alone with her 8-year-old daughter, Warda. When Samia, a young pregnant woman knocks on their door, Abla is far from imagining that her life will change forever.

programme.title: For The Birds
programme.desc: Irma is a tomboy who believes independence is the only form of freedom. Then she meets Sampie, a charming rugby player with a heart of gold and oh-so-soft hands who sweeps her right off her feet to the altar, but not before she teaches him a thing or two.

programme.title: Black Snow
programme.desc: Gosha is a trucker in northern Yakutia, who supplies his community with food, alongside low quality vodka which contributes to their alcoholism. When his truck breaks down during one of his trips, he finds himself alone in the wilderness.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - Death In The Forest
programme.desc: A teacher and his class come across a body in the forest with artifacts from the local museum, killed in a medieval ritual which involves being tied up and hunted in a forest. Detectives Zeiler and Oberlnder are called to investigate the brutal murder.

programme.title: The Sunny Side Up Story
programme.desc: After years of her husband disliking her sunny side eggs, a woman finally seeks out someone to find out her special recipe. Aside from the recipe, secrets are revealed, and feelings are laid bare.

programme.title: Dogworld
programme.desc: In the near future, two friends dream of leaving the Italian city of Taranto, a wasteland ruled over by warring gangs and surrounded by barbed wire. Recruited by a local gang, and with a girl coming between them, their friendship is put to the test.

programme.title: Polite People
programme.desc: A delightful comedy, Polite People is the story of a self-obsessed city dweller, so desperate to leave the city that he lies his way into a small farming community. Little does he know, he is unwittingly walking straight into a small-town political war.

programme.title: Gold Runner
programme.desc: After getting robbed, Reza loses his job delivering gold from workshops to jewellery stores. Together with his friend, Reza devises a plan to get back on his feet by finding a legendary diamond at the bottom of an enormous septic tank.

programme.title: Needle Park Baby
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Michelle Halbneer, Needle Park Baby recounts the unbelievable story of an eleven-year-old girl and a childhood growing up with heroin addicted parents set in Platzspitzpark, Zurichs public drug scene in the nineties.

A traffic accident in which Camilla, a lawyer, is involved results in the death of a young man. This forces her to investigate and face unfamiliar places and situations. While on this journey, she will meet Bruno and rediscover herself.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S3 11
programme.desc: At a yard sale, Michael helps a man realize his amazing mind powers and shocks a college student by discovering she's the heir to the entire lot. Later, an art gallery's tribal mask goes missing and has the security guard fearing war!

programme.title: The Informant!
programme.desc: What was Mark Whitacre thinking? A rising star at agri-industry giant Archer Daniels Midland (ADM), Whitacre suddenly turns whistleblower. Even as he exposes his company's multi-national price-fixing conspiracy to the FBI, Whitacre envisions himself being hailed as a hero of the common man and handed a promotion. But before all that can happen, the FBI needs evidence, so Whitacre eagerly agrees to wear a wire and carry a hidden tape recorder in his briefcase, imagining himself as a kind of de facto secret agent. Unfortunately for the FBI, their lead witness hasn't been quite so forthcoming about helping himself to the corporate coffers. Whitacre's ever-changing account frustrates the agents and threatens the case against ADM as it becomes almost impossible to decipher what is real and what is the product of Whitacre's rambling imagination. Based on the true story of the highest-ranking corporate whistleblower in U.S. history.

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: Offering a new take on J.M. Barrie's classic story of a flying boy who never ages, acclaimed British director Joe Wright reimagines the ageless tale for audiences worldwide. Set during World War II, the story follows the orphaned Peter, who's kidnapped by pirates and brought to the magical Neverland, where he finds both fun and dangers and ultimately discovers his destiny to free the land from the pirate Blackbeard and become the hero who will forever be known as Peter Pan.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 07
programme.desc: Leonard regrets his newfound authority at work when he's responsible to distributing grant money;And Bernadette turns the playhouse into her hideaway.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 08
programme.desc: Sheldon tries to bond with Amy's parents.Meanwhile, Raj and Anu attempt to get physical.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 09
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy are devastated to learn that Super-Asymmetry hase already been disproven.Meanwhile, Bernadette has Stuart's girlfriend (LAUREN LAPKUS) teach her Fortnite.

programme.desc: Penny & Leonard organize a paintball game that results in mayhem when Sheldon is jealous of Amy, Raj catches Anu with her ex, and Stuart doesn't want to move in with Denise.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 2
programme.desc: The guys pose as employees at a copy center, conduct bizarre exit interviews for moviegoers, and then lead some very peculiar protests. Later, it's Unhappy Hour for the big loser, as he cuts off paying customers at a party.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 3
programme.desc: The guys conduct focus groups to sell their illogical inventions created by the other guys, then head to a shoe store where they get off on the wrong foot. And the big loser discovers he's more flight than fight at the zoo.

programme.title: Red Riding Hood
programme.desc: Valerie is a beautiful young woman torn between two men. She is in love with a brooding outsider Peter, but her parents have arranged for her to marry the wealthy Henry. Unwilling to lose each other, Valerie and Peter are planning to run away together when they learn that Valerie's older sister has been killed by the werewolf that prowls the dark forest surrounding their village. Father Solomon, a famous werewolf hunter, warns that the wolf, who takes human form by day, could be any one of them. As the death toll rises with each moon, Valerie begins to suspect that the werewolf could be someone she loves. Panic grips the town as Valerie discovers that she has a unique connection to the beast.

programme.title: Syriana
programme.desc: Syriana: noun a geographical term referring to those Middle East hot spots that have proven volatile with regard to the security of the United States; a place in the Middle East where trouble is always breaking out. Based on the best-selling book See No Evil: The True Story of a Ground Soldier in the CIA's War on Terrorism by Robert Baer, this timely political thriller takes a penetrating look at the efforts of the U.S. intelligence-gathering community in the Middle East, weaving together several storylines ranging from American foreign policy and the CIA's role in it to the oil industry and terrorism. Welcome to Syriana.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S1 8

programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: There's more than one way to lose your life to a killer. The hunt is on for a serial killer in San Francisco. Few cases in the history of true crime are as intriguing as that of Zodiac, a bizarre gunman in an executioner's hood, who taunts the police with dozens of letters containing eerie messages and cryptograms. Director David Fincher (Panic Room, Fight Club, Se7en) captures the story of the infamous killer who terrorized the city in the late 1960s. Jake Gyllenhaal (Jarhead, The Day After Tomorrow), Robert Downey, Jr. (Kiss Kiss, Bang Bang), Anthony Edwards ("ER") and Mark Ruffalo (We Don't Live Here Anymore, Rumor Has It...) star.

programme.title: Eight Legged Freaks
programme.desc: What do you get when you cross toxic waste with a bunch of exotic spiders?.. Eaten!.. The residents of a rural mining town discover that an unfortunate chemical spill has caused hundreds of little spiders to mutate overnight to the size of SUVs. And their hungry! When the alarm is sounded, it's then up to mining engineer Chris McCormack and Sheriff Sam Parker to mobilize an eclectic group of townspeople, including the Sheriff's young son, Mike, her daughter, Ashley and paranoid radio announcer Harlan Griffith and Deputy Pete Willis into battle against the bloodthirsty eight-legged beasts.

programme.title: The Hangover Part Iii
programme.desc: It's been two years since the guys prowled the seamy side of Las Vegas in a roofie haze and recovered from being kidnapped, shot at and chased by drug-dealing mobsters in Bangkok. Phil, Stu and Doug are happily living uneventful lives at home. The only member of the Wolfpack who's not content is Alan. Still lacking a sense of purpose, the group's black sheep has ditched his meds and given in to his natural impulses in a big way which, for Alan, means no boundaries, no filters and no judgment until a personal crisis forces him to finally seek the help he needs. And who better than his three best friends to make sure he takes the first step. This time, there's no bachelor party. No wedding. What could possibly go wrong? But when the Wolfpack hits the road, all bets are off.

programme.title: Poker Face Ep10
programme.desc: The Hook - Charlie faces her greatest challenge yet when she is caught in the crossfire of a deadly power play that puts her in the sights of two ruthless crime syndicates and the FBI.

programme.title: Poker Face Ep1
programme.desc: Dead Man's Hand - When a close friend meets an untimely end, Charlie Cale, a casino cocktail waitress with an uncanny knack for identifying lies, is determined to unravel these mysterious events, even if it endangers her own life.

programme.title: Poker Face Ep2
programme.desc: The Night Shift - Wounded and on the run, Charlie is forced to make a pit stop in desolate New Mexico where she tries to clear the name of a trucker framed for the murder of a local.

programme.title: Poker Face Ep3
programme.desc: The Stall - Charlie takes a job at a family-run Texas BBQ joint and must use her skills of perception to sniff out the truth behind a shocking death.

programme.title: Poker Face Ep4
programme.desc: Rest In Metal - Charlie goes on tour with has-been metal band Doxxxology, a motley crew of dejected rockers whove spent decades trying to write a new hit; Charlie suspects foul play when one musician winds up dead.

programme.title: Poker Face Ep5
programme.desc: Time Of The Monkey - Working at a retirement home, Charlie makes friends with two rebellious old ladies who may have taken matters into their own hands.

programme.title: Poker Face Ep6
programme.desc: Exit Stage Death - Charlie's waitress job at a dinner theater is interrupted by a tragic death on stage during a performance by two washed-up television stars; when she starts to investigate, deadly motivations come to light.

programme.title: Poker Face Ep7
programme.desc: The Future Of The Sport - While working at a go-kart complex, Charlie becomes involved in a bitter feud between an aging race car driver and a hotheaded young upstart, whose rivalry has explosive consequences.

programme.title: Poker Face Ep8
programme.desc: The Orpheus Syndrome - A special effects artist unearths a past project to find closure from the guilt of a fatal on-set accident; when old demons resurface, Charlie is left to unravel a new deadly plot.

programme.title: Poker Face Ep9
programme.desc: Escape From The Ski Mountain - Charlie finds herself stranded in a motel during a blizzard; in order to survive the night, Charlie must decipher the deadly tension between her questionable companions.

programme.title: The Exorcism Of Emily Rose
programme.desc: A lawyer takes on the negligent homicide case of a priest who performed an exorcism on a college student.

programme.title: Crom
programme.desc: High school teenagers accidentally unleash an ancient Irish entity on their hometown and must stop it before midnight on Halloween

programme.title: Raiders Of The Lost Ark

programme.title: Indiana Jones And The Temple Of Doom
programme.desc: In this box office smash, Indiana Jones must rescue some missing children kidnapped by religious terrorists in the Orient who happen to possess some stolen, sacred jewels.

programme.title: Indiana Jones And The Last Crusade
programme.desc: After settling down to a quieter life, Indy is thrust back into action when his father mysteriously disappears while on a quest for the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Indiana Jones And The Kingdom Of The Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Famed archaeologist/adventurer Dr. Henry 'Indiana' Jones is called back into action when he becomes entangled in a Soviet plot to uncover the secret behind mysterious artifacts known as the Crystal Skulls.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: An enormous beast goes on a worldwide destructive rampage and is headed toward New York City.

programme.title: A Single Shot
programme.desc: A single shot, aimed at a lone deer, hits and kills a young woman. Hunter John Moon watches the young woman die before discovering a box of money near her body. In a desperate panic, he takes the cash and attempts to cover up the killing.

programme.title: Jack Taylor: The Guards
programme.desc: Jack is hired to search for a missing teenage daughter which he traces to a sleazy manager Ford's factory and illegal sex recordings. That turns out only the tip of the iceberg...

programme.title: Deadly Predators S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Wild and Weird - In this episode, Steve goes in search of the wildest Deadly Predators and takes a closer look at what makes them weird. He goes diving in Dorset to look for one of the sea's weirdest deadly fish - seahorses.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn S1 Ep4
programme.desc: A look at the Port Building, a stunning, gravity-defying office complex building that appears to hover over a 19th-century fire station, and uses a borehole energy system that makes it one of the most energy efficient buildings in Europe.

programme.title: South Korea with Alexander Armstrong S1 Ep3
programme.desc: In the final leg of his journey Alexander visits Busan, a coastal port and South Korea's second biggest city. He takes in a visit to a shaman, and climbs up Sunrise Peak, a UNESCO world heritage site.

programme.title: Planet Earth III S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Coasts - David Attenborough presents the first in a new series. Coasts: where two worlds collide, and where animals fight for survival amidst constant change.

programme.title: Dynasties S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Chimpanzee - In Senegal, West Africa, live a group of chimpanzees, led by an alpha male named David. He has already been alpha for 3 years - a time when leaders here are usually overthrown. To make matters worse, David has no allies - no-one to help him defend his leadership.

programme.title: Michael Palin - Into Iraq S1 Ep3
programme.desc: As he starts the final part of his journey deep into Iraq, Michael finds a local school in Baghdad and as he did in North Korea talks to the children about life in Iraq and what they hope to do in the future, and how they see the rest of the world. Michael then visits the ancient site of Babylon, a place he used to read about when he was studying the bible at school. He also gets access to enter the massive palace built by Saddam Hussein that overlooks the historic site.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S6 Ep8
programme.desc: Vacuum Cleaners - Gregg Wallace and Cherry Healey reveal the secrets behind production on an epic scale. This time they discover how a humble but hardy 'Henry' the vacuum cleaner is produced.

programme.title: Equator From The Air S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Pacific - Crossing the Pacific, Gordon discovers how a view from above is helping protect hammerhead sharks and giant tortoises, and what it could reveal about the future of our coral reefs.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Silk Road Adventure S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Georgia and Azerbaijan - Joanna continues her adventure following the ancient Silk Road from the Black Sea to the Caspian Sea, across the rapidly changing post-Soviet states of Georgia and Azerbaijan.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return To The Wild UK S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Fair Isle - Ben Fogle returns to meet his previous contributors who set up home in remote locations. In this episode he returns to Fair Isle, an island in Shetland in northern Scotland, where Tommy Hindman lives.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S8 Ep4
programme.desc: The Other Side - Ricko DeWilde travels to cursed lands to finally lay his brother's spirit to rest. Sue Aikens ventures into the tundra to map the shifting landscape.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Allies and Adversaries - Feel the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earths oddest creatures. Dive deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Next Generation - Channel your inner sci-fi fan and explore the bizarre mating rituals of the oceans most peculiar creatures. Learn how bloody battles for mates, gender bending and supersize litters of babies just might secure a next generation for these animals.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Ultimate Predator - Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its preys heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Ocean Voyagers - Navigate the oceans vast distances, depths, and darkness with nomadic sharks that thrive in the blue emptiness. Meet a lone blue shark traversing stormy Atlantic seas, and hundreds of hammerheads returning to their Pacific island breeding ground.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 Ep3
programme.desc: In the Extreme - Follow a host of sharks with extraordinary abilities that allow them to thrive in the most adverse conditions around the globe. Observe nearly blind Greenland sharks made for life in freezing Arctic waters, and another species that can walk on land.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Ancient Lineages - Some call them living fossils, but that's just another way to say survivors. From the shark to the horseshoe crab, these animals' early adaptations were a success, leaving them relatively unchanged for millions of years.

programme.title: Macro Worlds 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Winter is Coming - As soon as the days get cold and dark insects begin to disappear from the meadows and fields. Their sum and hum slowly fades away and will finally be gone. All animals have their special ways to survive winter. Migrating birds like swallows and cranes fly towards south, a lot of mammals like deer get a thick winter fur or hide away and sleep where its warm. But what do insects do? And why are they all back in spring?

programme.title: Macro Worlds 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Meadow of Horror - It is horror! It is murder! Brutal death as well as exciting fights with an exceptional last-minute rescue. And after seeing it you will know the creepiest spot is actually the meadow in your neighborhood. With stylistic devices from the horror genre this extraordinary nature documentary takes you on a journey following a well-known hero with six legs, red wings and seven black dots through a seemingly normal meadow but full of monsters.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Origin Stories - Get acquainted with an array of ocean oddballs and learn how billions of years worth of changes, from ice ages to asteroid strikes, have shaped their looks and skills. Meet blind worms who fish, walking sharks, tree-climbing crabs, and much more.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Africa's Great Oasis - the Okavango - Trapped in one of Africas great deserts is a lush, hidden world. It is an untamed wilderness unlike any other on Earth. Fed by a mighty river that travels from distant mountains, it is a vast mosaic of life, which pulsates with vivid beauty.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Next Generation - Channel your inner sci-fi fan and explore the bizarre mating rituals of the oceans most peculiar creatures. Learn how bloody battles for mates, gender bending and supersize litters of babies just might secure a next generation for these animals.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Life in the Leftovers - On the African savannah, the life of some depends on the death of others. In a cycle driven by predators and dependent on prey, none are more important than the two most powerful carnivores.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Apex Predators - Apex predators seem to have won the evolutionary lottery. These species hunt and kill with superior strength, and attack with impressive strategy and mechanics. They are at the top of their game and at the top of the food chain.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Origin Stories - Get acquainted with an array of ocean oddballs and learn how billions of years worth of changes, from ice ages to asteroid strikes, have shaped their looks and skills. Meet blind worms who fish, walking sharks, tree-climbing crabs, and much more.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Birds of Prey - Birds of prey are amazing hunters. Their adaptations allow them to catch a wide range of prey in a variety of environments. This is a look at some of the most fearsome North American birds of prey.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Insect Eaters - Every predator needs a speciality - and these tenacious insect-eaters have a great one. They evolved to hunt a virtually unlimited food source: bugs. With highly-developed hunting skills, they source, kill and consume with great success.

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lake Manyara National Park - In north Tanzania, towering mountains line a dramatic valley. Enriched by ancient volcanoes, its slopes provide a variety of habitats for life to thrive and its great centerpiece holds water through even the driest of times.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Drakensberg: Barrier of Spears - This documentary looks at the wildlife of The Drakensberg Mountain range. We take a look at how creatures survive in the hostile landscape, from the highest peaks to the rolling grasslands below.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Gardens in the Clouds - The ancient plants and animals of the Cloud Mountains of South Africa have long captured peoples imagination. Its a landscape defined by weather and threatened by invaders. But these mountains are not only a sanctuary for life in the present; they also offer a fascinating window into our past.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Sandveld: Land of Contrasts - A narrow and harsh belt of western coastline in southern Africa is a land of contrasts where creatures are forced to adapt to survive. Meet the quirky and charismatic inhabitants that call this fragile interplay between land and ocean home.

programme.title: Baboons: Rules of the Troop
programme.desc: Baboons: Rules of the Troop - Follow four families of four different species - the resourceful Beach Troop, the warlike Desert Troop, the disciplined River Troop, and the peaceful Mountain Band - to find out why these primates are among the most successful animals in Africa.

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Monkey Diaries - Hidden in the jungles of Sri Lanka is the toque macaque. Endemic to the island, these feisty group-living monkeys are found nowhere else on earth. And they are at the heart of the longest primate research project ever undertaken. Dr Wolfgang Dittus is on a quest to understand their complex society.

programme.title: How the Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: How the Wild Things Sleep - There is an endless variety of sleep-strategies among animals, yet it seems a universal behavior. But why bother with sleep at all? How do animals cope without sleep or the dangers of being unconscious in the wild? Just some of the baffling questions that lead through How the Wild Things Sleep.

programme.title: Supersenses 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Super Sight - Vision its how ninety-five percent of animals interpret the world. Every species on Earth is a chapter in the fascinating story of sight. This episode follows that story from blurry beginnigs to mind-blowing hexnocular vision.

programme.title: Supersenses 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Super Powers - See the animals that push the limits of physics, chemistry and engineering to pull off feats that humans can only dream of, and find out how evolution granted them with such amazing abilities. Sometimes it takes a super-power just to survive.

programme.title: Supersenses 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Invisible World - Dive into a dazzling world beyond human perception, where animals use their super senses to detect light we cant see, sound we cant hear and even stranger forces we cant begin to detect.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Birds of Prey - Birds of prey are amazing hunters. Their adaptations allow them to catch a wide range of prey in a variety of environments. This is a look at some of the most fearsome North American birds of prey.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Lady Elliot Island - Lady Elliot Island is the crown jewel of the Great Barrier Reef- the largest living structure on Earth. This southern-most island of the Reef chain is home to dizzying swirls of colour, life and diversity both above and below the water.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Insect Eaters - Every predator needs a speciality - and these tenacious insect-eaters have a great one. They evolved to hunt a virtually unlimited food source: bugs. With highly-developed hunting skills, they source, kill and consume with great success.

programme.title: Baboons: Rules of the Troop

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Cold-Blooded Killers - From our point of view, cold-blooded predators are brutal, savvy, programmed killers. But from their point of view, its just another day at the butchers counter. These are some of the most fearsome predators on Earth.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Masters of Defence - Staying alive is job one for these masters of defence. With clever adaptations like mimicry and poison on their side, they continue to outwit predators.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Garden Route - In a park where land meets sea, the natural elements combine to create wonderful variety. Cola-colored water feeds forests green and dense. Fire and wind fuel growth in great diversity and rock shapes a coastline of many faces. Life thrives here - from the magnificent to the bizarre. This is the Garden Route National Park.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Snows of Kilimanjaro - Mt. Kilimanjaro is the highest freestanding peak in Africa, it has five separate climatic zones. Jean Du Plessis is making his first climb to the peak. His mission is to see whether climate change is affecting the snow on the top of the mountain.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Allies and Adversaries - Feel the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earths oddest creatures. Dive deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Monkey Diaries - Hidden in the jungles of Sri Lanka is the toque macaque. Endemic to the island, these feisty group-living monkeys are found nowhere else on earth. And they are at the heart of the longest primate research project ever undertaken. Dr Wolfgang Dittus is on a quest to understand their complex society.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands with Eoin Warner 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Echoes of the Past - Learn how Arctic terns negotiate a 50,000-mile-a-year commute to summer in Kerrys Maharee Islands. Go whale-watching off Brandon Head, then witness Irelands greatest wildlife spectacle: a 1,000-strong colony of grey seals on Great Blasket Island.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Back with the Packs - Return to South Luangwa to see the new pups born to the mighty Manzi and the tiny-but-fearless Kakumbi packs. See yearling Snowy face a hungry hyena before a lion pride scatters Manzi mum Wekas pups and leaves her frantically searching for them.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Hunting with the Manzi - Run into a lion-hyena showdown with Julz as he hunts for the elusive Manzi pack, who are missing four of their precious pups. Then join Henry from the Zambian Carnivore Programme on a house call to the Kakumbi den, where another pup has gone AWOL.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Allies and Adversaries - Feel the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earths oddest creatures. Dive deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Outcasts - In the Luangwa Valley lies a grove of Ebony trees, home to a troop of baboons. But, there are dangers here the resident leopard who, unlike the other predators, is powerful and agile enough to climb trees. Hes not an easy foe to elude.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Living on the Edge - The plains and woodlands of the Luangwa Valley are the wildest and most merciless of all neighborhoods where duels between predator and prey are played out both day and night. For the animals that call this home, its a daily battle to stay alive.

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales Of Arcadia Ep18
programme.desc: The Shattered King - While Jim and Toby search for dates to the Spring Dance the team searches for the Second Triumbric Stone in the marshlands of the Quagawumps.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep19
programme.desc: Xerx Works - On a mission to destroy the factory that manufactures Octavians Xerx warriors, Cleo and Pharaoh Yosira butt heads over whos in charge and Mihos masquerades as a cabbage.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep20
programme.desc: Parasites - Mihos has some parasites making him sick, and Cleo and the rest have to shrink down tiny to cure him. This one turns out weirder than youre expecting.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep35
programme.desc: Hitting the Sky Note / Hug Fest - When Poppy discovers that Sky Toronto doesnt sing, she sets out to convince him that singing is the greatest joy in the world./Poppy shows Branch around his first Hug Fest, a Troll festival to celebrate hugs.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep6
programme.desc: The Giver / Bellow Bug Day - Poppy attempts to discover which troll has been giving out yearly gifts at the Harvest MoonWhen Poppy accidentally ruins a Troll holiday her attempt to fix things keeps leading to more disasters.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep7
programme.desc: Prank Day / Adventures In Dinkles-Sitting - When Branch declares himself Prank Master Poppy gets evenTaking care of Mr. Dinkles is a bit harder than expected for Securityobsessed Branch.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep44
programme.desc: Troll Playing Game/ Finn Cascade - Poppy discovers Branch hosting a Trolly roleplaying game in his Bunker. But when she joins the game, she insists on prioritizing fun over the rules, posing in-game problems for Branch./ Branch goes to great lengths to get a picture with Finn Cascade, the coolest fish in the Trolls Lagoon. But it seems as though Finn isnt interested

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep32
programme.desc: Scrap to the Future / Bringing Up Birdy - As shes preparing for the Hearts & Crafts Festival, Poppy finds a mysterious scrapbook that seems to predict the future and it shows the festival being a disaster! She and Branch set out to prevent the predictions from coming true. But is there a downside to being over prepared?/When a nest full of just-hatched baby birds imprint on Branch, he must overcome his fear of birds in order to raise them right.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep33
programme.desc: Blank Day / Haircuffed - When Poppy finds out theres a day on the Troll calendar with no existing holiday, as Queen she must help choose a new one./In an attempt to get Creek and Branch to stop arguing, Poppy braids their hair together, forcing them to learn to get along.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep68
programme.desc: Chain Of Command - Krogen is on the hunt for dragon lenses and Snotlout and Minden do their best to defend Wing Island. Back in Berk Dagur and Mala feud over keeping the lenses safe

programme.desc: The Battle(s) of Gongmen Bay - Po and the Kids agree to escort a dirigible shipment of food to a drought-torn region of China. But Nu Hai has some suspicions about Shi Long, which she finds aren't far off when she discovers the dirigible is set to explode...with them on board!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep20
programme.desc: Gongmen City Hustle - Po and the Kids make it to Gongmen City in search of the contact they heard has some info on the dirigible crash. Meanwhile, Xiao, mourning the presumed death of her new panda friends, takes off into the woods and meets a new friend.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep34
programme.desc: Marshtato Fairy / Do the Biggie - On the foggiest night of the year, the Marshtato Fairy magically delivers marshtatos to Troll Village, which every Troll loves and celebrates- except for Branch, who doesnt think the Marshtato Fairy exists. When Poppy encourages him to believe, Branch set out to prove Poppy wrong. /When Biggie accidentally invents a dance craze, he realizes how much he enjoys being the center of attention. Biggie and Guy set out to create another Troll dance sensation in order to keep Biggies big moment going.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep4
programme.desc: Egg Nag/Game On - The Mighty Ones accidentally knock a bird's Egg out of its nest and must take turns trying to incubate the incredibly annoying Egg until it hatches. / The Mighty Ones move into a board game in the yard that they believe to be a "city," and it's all fun and games until Berry's capitalist greed gets the best of her.

programme.desc: Titan Up - When the Orphans start rumors that Puss has special powers, Taranis the God of Thunder asks Puss to help defeat the most powerful God of all, Toutatis

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep29
programme.desc: Rupert and the Dancing Shoes - Raggety wants new shoes but can't afford them so Ping Pong tries to jazz up the ones he's wearing but her spell goes wrong and the shoes dance off with Raggety inside them and unable to stop. Will Rupert and Ping Pong be able to stop Raggety in time before the shoes carry him one step too far, into danger?

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep30
programme.desc: Rupert and the Oldest Tree - Rupert is on a hunt for leaves to fill his new wall chart. He meets Raggety who offers to help him find a strange star-shaped leaf from a magical tree the oldest tree in Nutwood. The Fox Twins don't think much of leaf hunting. They overhear Rupert's plans and decide to play a trick on Rupert and Raggety. But their trick backfires when Raggety does some elf magic and Freddie vanishes into thin air. How will Rupert and Raggety find Freddie and get him back to Freda? And what of their search for the oldest tree in the forest?

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep31
programme.desc: Rupert and the Clockwork Dragon - Ming is hurt when Rupert and friends appear to prefer Bill's new toy dragon to her. But when the toy gets them lost in the woods they discover there are some things that only a real dragon can do.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep32
programme.desc: Rupert and the Moon Adventure - With the sun low in the sky, Rupert waves to Ping Pong, Bill, Edward and Ming as they join him at his cottage. They are all going to stay up late to see something very special an eclipse of the moon. Bill is just explaining what an eclipse is when Raggety arrives. In his impatience, he does not want to wait for the moon to rise. He wants to see it straight away. Raggety does elf magic to see the moon at once but promptly vanishes. The others think he is playing a trick and hiding from them, but when Bill looks through the telescope, keen to see the start of the eclipse he gets a shock. Raggety has got his wish to see the moon. His magic has taken him there! How will Rupert and friends get him back down before the eclipse shrinks the moon down to nothing? It is a race against time to save their little elf friend.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep29
programme.desc: How Can We Make The Most Beautiful Garden Ever? - Poor Mimi! Her normally beautiful garden is all messy and full of swirly piles of earth. She's really upset and Jess promises to her help her make it the most beautiful garden ever! Raking away the swirls doesn't work, they just come back! Jess and Mimi realise that worms are making the swirly piles of earth. Mimi wants to move them away but they go back underground before she can catch them. When it rains the worms come back and Jess and Mimi gather up the worms in a bucket and take them to live in the orchard by a patch of scrappy flowers. The garden still isn't looking at it's best though! After the worms have gone Mimi's flowers go all droopy. Willow explains that worms make help make the soil rich and good for plants and that's what makes the flowers bloom. Jess remembers that the worms had come out when it rained. They water the ground to bring the worms up to the surface again. The worms agree to come back to Mimi's garden and soon her garden is beautiful again. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep30
programme.desc: Why Are There Little Hills In The Orchard? - Jess and the pups have been looking after the orchard while Willow's been on holiday but the day she's due back the orchard is full of little piles of earth. What's making them? That's the Big Question. Jess wonders if someone put them there. He asks Mimi, who's making a pile of earth while she digs a hole. She tells him she's going to plant an apple tree. Maybe someone's been planting new apple trees in the orchard thinks Jess. But when he looks carefully there are no holes or newly planted trees. Horace the hoppy frog suggests that maybe it's an invisible digger who's digging underground. Billie the little mouse arrives and tells Jess that the little piles of earth are called molehills. Jess works out that the piles of earth are in a line. Maybe someone is digging a tunnel underground so they can travel right across the orchard. They keep very quiet and a tiny mole pops out above ground. That's who's been making piles of earth in the orchard. They've answered the question. Hooray!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep31
programme.desc: Why Are There So Many Ladybirds? - One winter morning Jess finds lots of ladybird in his barn. Why are they there? That's the Big Question! Mimi tells him that she has lots of ladybirds in her garden in the summer. They're always hungry and brilliant for the plants because they eat all the greenfly. Maybe they're looking for greenfly in his barn? Jess doesn't think so. There are no greenfly in the barn. He goes to ask Baa and Billie for help. They're saying goodbye to Little Bird who's flying away to a warmer country for the winter. Jess thinks maybe the ladybirds are gathering to fly away too and rushes back to his barn to say goodbye. But when he gets there he finds that the ladybirds are now all huddled together and fast asleep. What's going on? Jess goes to ask Willow and finds a hedgehog sleeping under some leaves near the stable. Willow explains that some animals find it hard to find food in the winter, especially if they can't store it, so they eat as much as they can and then go to sleep during the winter. It's called hibe

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep32
programme.desc: How Can I Stop Little Bird Eating The Seeds? - Mimi's really upset with Little Bird who keeps eating all her lettuce seeds. Jess wonders how they can stop her. They try putting out extra food for her but Little Bird just eats everything! Jess wonders if covering the seeds with something so that Little Bird can't reach them would work. Mimi says it's a good idea but the sun won't reach the seeds either which means they won't grow. The only thing that seems to stop t Little Bird is when she sees Jess and is frightened away. But Jess can't stand still in the vegetable patch forever! Willow sees him and tells him he's being a scarecrow. A scarecrow? Yes, something that scares away the birds. Mimi has a brilliant idea to make the perfect scarecrow. A Jess scarecrow. Little Bird stops eating the lettuce seeds and eats from the lovely bird table they put out for her instead. Hooray!

programme.title: Olivia Ep47
programme.desc: Olivia Explores Outer Space - Olivia is assigned to do a school project based on one of the planets in the solar system, but they're all so interesting, she just can't decide which one! With a little help from her brother Ian, she finds a solution: create a model of the entire solar system, and maybe even discover a brand new planet in the process

programme.title: Olivia Ep48
programme.desc: Olivia Goes To The Beach - When Grandma takes Olivia and Ian to a special beach, they're all shocked to find that Grandma's old friend Annette has built a huge fence blocking the best part of the beach. They don't let that stop them from having a good time. Soon with Olivia's prompting, even Annette wants to join in on the fun.

programme.title: Olivia Ep49
programme.desc: Olivia's Snow Day - It's a snow day and school's closed. Olivia takes to the snow-covered streets with Julian as her cameraman, to report on all the snow day happenings. The biggest story of the day turns out to be an alleged sighting of the legendary abominable snowman. Can it be true? Olivia tracks down the real story.

programme.title: Olivia Ep50
programme.desc: Olivia's Ice Spectacular - Olivia can't wait to see skating star Sonja Spencer perform in Cinderella on Ice. She's sure she'll be the lucky audience member chosen to skate with Sonja, and begins practicing on the skating rink she makes in her own backyard. When the show is canceled, Olivia decides the show must go on and she and her friends stage their own ice spectacular.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep29
programme.desc: Why Wildebeest Stampede - You see there was a time when Wildebeest didn't stampede. They used to stand on the plains and munch grass all day. But there were so many of them and they were eating so much grass that all the animals had to do something about it. Tortoise realized that the Wildebeest weren't the brightest animals in Tinga Tinga and they always did whatever the last beast said. So the animals decided to tell the Wildebeest that they were welcome to stay in Tinga Tinga and they must never RUN!' So what did the Wildebeest do? They ran and they ran and they RAN! So that's Why Wildebeest Stampede! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep30
programme.desc: Why Chameleon Changes Colour - You see there was a time when Chameleon wasn't bright and colourful at all. In fact Chameleon was rather dull and grey like a rainy day. One day when all the animals are playing games and sheltering from the rains Chameleon decides to slip away because he feels boring. Butterfly comes across Chameleon sitting sadly on a rock and shows him a rainbow. Chameleon can't resist and stands on the Rainbow, and TA-DAH!! He turns red and yellow and pink and green! Chameleon soaks up all the colours of the magical rainbow and now, KAPOW!! Chameleon can be any colour he wants! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep31
programme.desc: Why Leopard Has Spots - You see there was a time when Leopard didn't have spots. All the animals had something special; Lion had his mane, Peacock his beautiful tail, Zebra his stripes but Leopard was as plain as plain can be. Then one day Leopard made friends with Puff Adder with his bright colourful spots. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep32
programme.desc: Why Hyena Has Short Back Legs - You see there was a time when Hyena didn't have short back legs. He was always chasing around and nipping other animals on the bottom. Then one day the animals had enough. It was time to teach that naughty Hyena a lesson! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep22
programme.desc: The Itch To Switch / Mismatched Socks - When Tag is frustrated living in a crowded house, and Scooch is bored in a quiet house, the two friends switch houses for the day. At first they both love their new lives. But as Scooch gets overwhelmed by all the activity at The Barker house, and Tag gets bored by the quiet life at the Poochs, they eagerly switch back before the day is done. \ When the Pawston Get Sox go on a losing streak, Tag and Scooch come up with the idea to have a team mascot. And Frank and Beans are the perfect fit! But when the two mascots start to clash over who gets the spotlight, Tag has to help save their friendship, and the big game!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep10
programme.desc: Longest Yardwork / The Girl Who Cried Goose - Donna plans a garden party for Rona, but the only problem is that her garden is overgrown and neglected. The team try to transform this jungle into a backyard just in time for the party. / Lula finds an angry goose on the loose, and Team Zenko need to get it out of the park before soccer camp starts.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep19
programme.desc: FOMO-OPUP / Lost in the Woods - Poppy and Archer get lost in Troll Forest together during one of his escape attempts and must learn to trust each other/Obsessed with finding Nova Swift's next pop-up party, Guy Diamond enlists the Snack Pack to help him on the hunt

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep20
programme.desc: Party Crashed - When the Party Crashers invade Troll Village, they trap Poppy and Branch, party throughout the village, and challenge the Trolls to a dramatic sing-off

programme.desc: El Apasionado Negocio de la Niera - Frederic makes a play to take over the town's babysitters by instituting "senior sitting"

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep22
programme.desc: Rise of the Empress - On the Volcano Island, Po and the Kids are reunited with Li, Grandma, Ping, Rooster, Wing, and Wong, and work together to find out what's really going on the island. Xiao becomes suspicious of some of her royal workers.

programme.desc: Hitting the Sky Note / Hug Fest - When Poppy discovers that Sky Toronto doesnt sing, she sets out to convince him that singing is the greatest joy in the world./Poppy shows Branch around his first Hug Fest, a Troll festival to celebrate hugs.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep5
programme.desc: Creepy Caterpillar/Code of Silence - When Twig introduces Leaf to his new caterpillar friend Josh, Leaf must overcome his debilitating fear of caterpillars in order to give Josh a chance. / Hot tempered Rabbit is sick of the noise from the Mighty Ones games, so he makes them a bet that they cant go for a whole day without making a sound. Desperate to see them fail, Rabbit spends the entire day making secret attempts to get the Mighty Ones to talk.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep48
programme.desc: Boar Games - When Roz the boar comes to San Lorenzo to collect a bounty for capturing Puss, Pajuna tries to keep them separated before an epic fight breaks out

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep69
